00044   class IOHandlerData : public IOHandler {
00045

00047 
00048     IOHandlerData(int sd, struct sockaddr_in &addr, DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp)
00049       : IOHandler(sd, addr, dhp), m_request_cache(), m_send_queue() {
00050       m_connected = false;
00051       reset_incoming_message_state();
00052       m_id = atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_connection_id);
00053     }
00054 
00055     void reset_incoming_message_state() {
00056       m_got_header = false;
00057       m_message_header_remaining = sizeof(Header::Common);
00058       m_message = 0;
00059       m_message_ptr = 0;
00060       m_message_remaining = 0;
00061     }
00062 
00063     int send_message(CommBufPtr &cbp, time_t timeout=0, DispatchHandler *disp_handler=0);
00064 
00065     int flush_send_queue();

00068     virtual bool handle_event(struct kevent *event);
00069 #elif defined(__linux__)
00070     virtual bool handle_event(struct epoll_event *event);
00071 #else
00072     ImplementMe;
00073 #endif
00074 
00075     bool handle_write_readiness();
00076 
00077     int connection_id() { return m_id; }
